Title: 36 Hours
Writer: George Seaton (screenplay), Roald Dahl (story "Beware of the Dog"), Carl K. Hittleman (story), Luis H. Vance (story)
Actors: James Garner, Eva Marie Saint, Rod Taylor, Werner Peters
Plot: Germans kidnap an American major and try to convince him that World War II is over, so that they can get details about the Allied invasion of Europe out of him.
